Articles.Content:
Hi, i've got a simple rover build that i tested to work on Kerbin and it functions just fine, i use this rover to put my base parts into place. However i just got the rover and some base parts on Minmus but the rover is constantly speeding up. I can only brake it by hitting reverse.

So basically the rover is uncontrollable. It might be something with Minmus or with the new update 1.3.1.

Anybody an idea wat could be wrong, or is this a common issue?

BTW. I have full probe control (most of the time) from the radio connection.
